collectors.action_needed: Please change <user>, <app>, and <saved search name> to reflect a search that is struggling
Please change <user>, <app>, and <saved search name> to reflect a search that is working fine

name: Scheduler issues
description: This template is used to evaluate the search scheduler. The collector compares and records the scheduler behavior for a pair of defined searches. The template must be run on a search head, or the captain in a search head cluster. The template requires two saved search names to compare.
